long_description: Attach the Nitecore T0 flashlight to your keychain for a convenient, bright light that travels with you wherever you go. High-quality Nichia LED outputs 12 lumens to light up the dark. Turn the light on and off with a quick twist of the bezel. 1 AAA battery (sold separately) provides up to 21 hrs. of use. Nitecore T0 flashlight has an IPX8 water-resistance rating.
short_description: Attach the Nitecore T0 flashlight to your keychain for a convenient, bright light that travels with you wherever you go.
